system.description: Channelers of the magic of creation, luminaries are philosophers, muses, and healers of the people.

features.name: Theurgy
features.description: You can Cast Spells using Mysticism. Spells: You learn 4 Spells, two of which must always be Life and Light. You learn 1 other Spell every 2 Luminary Levels hereafter. Mana: Your Maximum Mana is equal to (4 × your Luminary Level), and the highest amount of Mana you can spend to Cast a Spell is equal to (Awareness + half your Luminary Level, round up). You regain spent Mana when you Rest.

features.name: Radiant Healer
features.description: You get the Assured Healer Perk, and the healing rolls of your Spells can also explode on their highest value.

features.name: Overheal
features.description: If you restore HP that exceeds the Being's Max HP, you can give the excess to yourself or a Being you can see.

features.name: Ever-Cure
features.description: When you restore HP, you can end either a Charmed, Confused, Dazed, Frightened, or Sickened Status affecting the Target.

features.name: Revivify
features.description: You can revive a Being with the Life Spell if it has been dead for as long as 1 hour. If you die, you are revived automatically. Afterward, you cannot be revived by this Feature for 1 day.

features.name: Saving Grace
features.description: Your healing rolls can also explode on a 2.

features.name: Life-Giver
features.description: Beings you revive are revived at 4 Fatigue if their Fatigue was previously higher, and do not gain Fatigue from your Life Spell.
